name: ASSOCIAZIONE FEDERTRASPORTI
membership: LEGA COOP PRODUZIONE E SERVIZI (our holding company FEDERSERVICE IS ASSOCIATED)
goal: OUR ASSOCIATION'S AIM IS TO AGGREGATE TRANSPORT AND LOGISTIC COMPANIES TO FULFILL ECONOMIES OF SCALE AND CREATE COMMERCIAL OPPORTUNITIES OF COMMON INTEREST
euInitiatives: EACH INITIATIVE RELATED TO GOODS TRANSPORT BY ROAD OR MULTIMODAL MODALITY AND EVERY LEGISLATIVE FILE REGARDING LOGISTIC ISSUES (E.G. ROAD MOBILITY PACKAGE, ROAD HAULAGE MARKET, COMBINED TRANSPORT REVIEW, TEN-T NETWORK AND SO ON)
